article:
A 'market analysis' studies the attractiveness and the dynamics of a special
market within a special industry. It is part of the industry analysis and this
in turn of the global environmental analysis. Through all of these analyses the
opportunities, strengths, weaknesses and threats of a company can be identified.
Finally, with the help of a SWOT analysis, adequate business strategies of a
company will be defined. The market analysis is also known as a
documented investigation of a market that is used to inform a firm's planning
activities, particularly around decisions of inventory, purchase, work force
expansion/contraction, facility expansion, purchases of capital equipment,
promotional activities, and many other aspects of a company.
